oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nu!numma-!kuiten, who fetches crying children. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-29. 8555-8560). Parents threaten their misbehaving children with !nu !numma-!kuiten (or 'White Mouth'), who kills children who cry. 1) p.8554v: |han=kass'o heard this from his maternal grandfather (Tsatsi); what !nu !numma and !kuiten means, 2) See Spoken of a parrot in the village of Mowbray, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-29.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nu !numma-!kuiten
